message.content:
I need to identify and extract the specific line items and value of costs related to general management and administration of the entity as a whole from the given income statement.

Looking at the income statement, I can see that "Administrative Expenses" is the line item that represents the costs of general management and administration of the entity. This is a common category for such expenses in financial statements.

In the income statement provided, the value for Administrative Expenses is 11762.87 as of 2024-02-05.

Therefore, the value of costs related to general management and administration is 11762.87.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '11762.87'}}
```
